snippet: Gehad el-Haddad, a senior official of the Muslim Brotherhood who dealt with the foreign news media, was the latest of the group’s spokesmen to be apprehended.
abstract: Security forces in Egypt arrest Gehad el-Haddad, a senior official of the Muslim Brotherhood who handled group's communication with foreign news media; his arrest is part of a continuing roundup of thousands of Brotherhood members in the two months since the military ouster of Pres Mohamed Morsi.
lead_paragraph: Gehad el-Haddad, a senior official of the Muslim Brotherhood who dealt with the foreign news media, was the latest of the group’s spokesmen to be apprehended.

headline.main: Egypt Arrests Brotherhood Figure Who Handled News Media
headline.print_headline: Egypt Arrests Brotherhood Figure Who Handled Media
